knimeNode.name: GroupLoFGenes
knimeNode.shortDescription: Takes a gene summary as input and groups genes as never observed, LoF in-/tolerant.

fullDescription.intro: This node takes a gene summary of the LOFSummary node as input and groups the genes using the average LoF probability. All genes that can be found in the CDS file but not in the gene summary file are written to the never observed genes list. The average LoF probability is used to calculate whether a gene is affected more often than expected. Those genes are called LoF tolerant genes. Genes that are affected less often than expected are assigned to the group of LoF intolerant genes.
fullDescription.option: Gene summary file written by the LOFSummary node.

File containing all ENSEMBL genes. It can be found here:
http://www.ensembl.org/info/data/ftp/index.html
If this file is not provided never observed genes cannot be determined.
The number of samples of the underlying study is used to determine whether a gene is significantly more or less affected than expected.

ports.inPort: Cell 2: Path to gene summary file.
ports.outPort:
Cell 0: Path to list of never observed genes.
Cell 1: Path to list of LoF tolerant genes.
Cell 2: Path to list of LoF intolerant genes.
